email.subject: [ApplicationName] - Member Awaiting Activation!
email.body:
Dear Administrator,
A new member ([RecipientUsername]) has recently registered and requires activation within the knowledgebase.
This could be because you have chosen to manually approve all new registrations.
If you have NOT chosen to approve new members it's likely you have enabled COPPA registration and this new member is under the age of 13. If this is the case please remember to only approve the account once you receive a signed permission form from the child's parent or guardian. Click the link below to view & edit this member's profile...

You will need to be logged in with administrator access to view this link.
